content: round go to brim brim work 2x2 rib k2 p2 repeat to end for fingering work 8 row 8 10 10 row sport work 6 row 6 8 8 row worsted work 4 row 4 6 6 row go to colorwork band colorwork band switch to c1 and go up 2 needle sizes us7/4 5mm for fingering us8/5mm for sport and us9/5 5mm for worsted work desired chart for your size/sts from pages 3-8 read every row from right to left starting at the bottom go to stockinette stockinette switch to mc - work stockinette knit all until piece measures from cast on edge 5 5 /14cm 6 /15 25cm 6 5 /16 5cm 7 /17 75cm go to decreases decreases all sizes and yarn weights 1 k6 k2tog repeat to end 63 70 77 84 91 98 sts row 2 & all even row through 12 knit all 3 k5 k2tog repeat to end 54 60 66 72 78 84 sts 5 k4 k2tog repeat to end 45 50 55 60 65 70 sts 7 k3 k2tog repeat to end 36 40 44 48 52 56 sts 9 k2 k2tog repeat to end 27 30 33 36 39 42 sts 11 k1 k2tog repeat to end 18 20 22 24 26 28 sts 13 k2tog repeat to end 9 10 11 12 13 14 sts 14 for even number of sts k2tog repeat to end or for odd number of sts k1 k2tog repeat to end 5 5 6 6 7 7 sts finishing cut long tail thread through remaining sts pull to close and tie off weave in all ends and enjoy copyright 2011 & 2014 kimberly golynskiy all rights reserved for pattern support contact 80skeins@gmail com f*ck cancer hat # <=< * > @<=2a b</cdd 5 6 7 0 8 9 5 6 7 0 5 6 7 0 8 9 5 6 7 0 5 6 7 0 8 9 5 6 7 0 1234 #$ %& *+& & - /- %& 0*+& & - - f*ck cancer hat 3 86 <$< * => @a2b @/cdd > @e> a f@/cdd 5 0 6 7 8 9 5 0 5 0 6 7 8 9 5 0 5 0 6 7 8 9 5 0 1234 #$ %& *+& & - /- %& 0*+& & - - f*ck cancer hat 4 55 <=< * > @<=2a /2abc/d <e @= </fggd %bhi2@bhi j</fgg 7 8 9 0 5 6 7 8 9 0 7 8 9 0 5 6 7 8 9 0 7 8 9 0 5 6 7 8 9 0 1234 #$ %& *+& & - /- %& 0*+& & - - f*ck cancer hat 5 2 <=< * > @<=4a bc@d4e <f @= /4agh/e %gid4@gid </cbb 2 8 1 0 9 7 2 8 1 0 7 2 8 1 0 9 7 2 8 1 0 7 2 8 1 0 9 7 2 8 1 0 3456 #$ %& *+& & -
